connector.description:
Receive data from an AWS Cloudtrail.

The basic authentication method for the Cloudtrail service is to specify an access key and a secret key. These parameters are optional because the Kamelet provides a default credentials provider.

camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.acce.name: camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.accessKey
camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.acce.description: The access key obtained from AWS.

camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.secr.name: camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.secretKey
camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.secr.description: The secret key obtained from AWS.

camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.useD.name: camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.useDefaultCredentialsProvider
camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.useD.description: If true, the Cloudtrail client loads credentials through a default credentials provider. If false, it uses the basic authentication method (access key and secret key).

camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.useP.name: camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.useProfileCredentialsProvider
camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.useP.description: Set whether the Cloudtrail client should expect to load credentials through a profile credentials provider.

camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.useS.name: camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.useSessionCredentials
camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.useS.description: Set whether the CloudTrail client should expect to use Session Credentials. This is useful in situation in which the user needs to assume a IAM role for doing operations in CloudTrail.

camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.prof.name: camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.profileCredentialsName
camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.prof.description: If using a profile credentials provider this parameter will set the profile name.

camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.sess.name: camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.sessionToken
camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.sess.description: Amazon AWS Session Token used when the user needs to assume a IAM role.

camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.uriE.name: camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.uriEndpointOverride
camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.uriE.description: The overriding endpoint URI. To use this option, you must also select the `overrideEndpoint` option.

camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.over.name: camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.overrideEndpoint
camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.over.description: Select this option to override the endpoint URI. To use this option, you must also provide a URI for the `uriEndpointOverride` option.

camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.maxR.name: camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.maxResults
camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.maxR.description: Maximum number of records that will be fetched in each poll.

camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.even.name: camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.eventSource
camel.kamelet.aws-cloudtrail-source.even.description: Specify an event source to select events. Example: secretsmanager.amazonaws.com
